[00:00.00]Intentions - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)/Quavo

[00:00.64]Justin Bieber：
[00:13.78]Picture perfect you don't need no filter
[00:16.96]Gorgeous make 'em drop dead you a killer
[00:20.00]Shower you with all my attention
[00:23.45]Yeah these are my only intentions
[00:26.38]Stay in the kitchen cookin' up got your own bread
[00:29.78]Heart full of equity you're an asset
[00:32.97]Make sure that you don't need no mentions
[00:36.30]Yeah these are my only intentions
[00:39.61]Shout out to your mom and dad for makin' you
[00:42.71]Standin' ovation they did a great job raising you
[00:45.39]Ooh when I create you're my muse
[00:48.58]That kind of smile that makes the news
[00:51.23]
[00:52.26]Can't nobody throw shade on your name in these streets
[00:55.64]Triple threat you a boss you a bae you a beast
[00:58.84]You make it easy to choose
[01:01.37]You got a mean touch I can't refuse
[01:03.92]No I can't refuse it
[01:05.57]Picture perfect you don't need no filter

[01:11.92]Shower you with all my attention
[01:15.26]Yeah these are my only intentions
[01:18.35]Stay in the kitchen cookin' up got your own bread

[01:28.29]Yeah these are my only intentions
[01:31.29]Already pass you don't need no approval
[01:34.53]Good everywhere don't worry 'bout no refusal
[01:37.68]Second to none you got the upper hand now
[01:41.07]Don't need a sponsor nope you the brand now
[01:44.07]You're my rock my Colorado
[01:47.31]Get that ring just like Toronto
[01:50.43]Love you now a little more tomorrow
[01:53.73]This how I feel act like you know that you are-
[01:57.52]Picture perfect you don't need no filter
[02:00.51]Gorgeous make 'em drop dead you a killer
[02:03.84]Shower you with all my attention
[02:07.25]Yeah these are my only intentions
[02:10.22]Stay in the kitchen cookin' up got your own bread

[02:19.75]Yeah yeah
[02:20.17]Yeah these are my only intentions
[02:22.35]Quavo
[02:22.59]Quavo：
[02:22.79]No cap no pretendin'
[02:24.40]You don't need mentions
[02:25.26]No cap
[02:25.69]Got 'em sayin' goals they don't wanna be independent
[02:28.59]'Pendent
[02:29.05]Tell them to mind your business
[02:30.70]Woo
[02:30.97]We in our feelings
[02:32.24]It's fifty-fifty percentage
[02:33.54]Fifty
[02:33.87]Attention we need commitment
[02:35.06]Oh
[02:35.59]We gotta both admit it
[02:36.63]Both
[02:37.11]It's funny we both listen
[02:38.30]Both
[02:38.64]It's a blessing
[02:40.44]'Cause we both get it
[02:41.66]Both
[02:42.06]You the best thing and I don't need a witness
[02:45.00]Best thing
[02:45.33]I'ma find me a ring and pray it's perfect fitted
[02:48.04]Perfect perfect
[02:48.71]Justin Bieber：
[02:49.36]Picture perfect you don't need no filter
[02:51.97]No filter
[02:52.70]Gorgeous make 'em drop dead you a killer
[02:55.25]Oh-oh
[02:55.77]Shower you with all my attention
[02:58.46]I will
[02:59.26]Yeah these are my only intentions
[03:01.83]Yeah
[03:02.15]Stay in the kitchen cookin' up got your own bread

data.trans:
[ti:Intentions]
[ar:Justin Bieber/Quavo]
[al:Intentions]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.21]//
[00:00.42]//
[00:00.64]//
[00:13.78]你的照片超美 根本就不需要滤镜
[00:16.96]你光芒闪耀 让他们自惭形秽 你堪称夺心杀手
[00:20.00]我所有的注意力全都被你吸引
[00:23.45]没错 这就是我唯一的想法
[00:26.38]你呆在厨房 专心致志的烘焙着面包
[00:29.78]你有着一颗正直善良的心 绝对是珍宝
[00:32.97]确定你无需仰仗我的名气
[00:36.30]没错 这就是我唯一的想法
[00:39.61]想对创造你的爸爸妈妈喊话
[00:42.71]抚养你长大成人对我来说真是幸事一件
[00:45.39]噢 我诞生的那一刻起 你就是我的女神
[00:48.58]你魅力四射的笑容都能成为头条新闻
[00:51.23]
[00:52.26]任何人都不能肆意造谣 无端指责你
[00:55.64]你堪称“三重威胁”既是我的老大 又是我的宝贝 更是我的小“怪兽”
[00:58.84]你让我轻易下定决心
[01:01.37]你无与伦比的爱抚 我无法抗拒
[01:03.92]不 我难以抗拒
[01:05.57]你的照片超美 根本就不需要滤镜

[01:15.26]没错 这就是我唯一的想法
[01:18.35]你呆在厨房 专心致志的烘焙着面包
[01:21.57]你有着一颗正直善良的心 绝对是珍宝
[01:24.89]确定你无需仰仗我的名气
[01:28.29]没错 这就是我唯一的想法
[01:31.29]我的心早已接受你 你无需其他准许
[01:34.53]一切都是那样美好 无需担心 我的心门永远对你敞开
[01:37.68]你就是No.1 你就是绝对的老大
[01:41.07]什么赞助商都不稀罕 你就是绝对招牌
[01:44.07]你就是我的依靠 我心中的科罗拉多
[01:47.31]为你戴上堪比多伦多猛龙队NBA总冠军戒指的超大婚戒
[01:50.43]此刻我很爱你 明天只会更爱你
[01:53.73]这就是我的感觉 你的举手投足好像在说你知道
[01:57.52]你的照片超美 根本就不需要滤镜
